original_text: The Lord grant that you may find rest, each of you in the house of her husband!” Then she kissed them, and they lifted up their voices and wept.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희에게 허락하사 각기 남편의 집에서 위로를 받게 하시기를 원하노라 하고 그들에게 입 맞추매 그들이 소리를 높여 울며

sentences.original_text: The Lord grant that you may find rest
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 너희가 안식을 찾게 하시기를 원하시노라

sentences.original_text: each of you in the house of her husband!
and they lifted up their voices
